title: Share Your Smile: Raina's Guide to Telling Your Own Story
description: Have you ever thought about creating your own comics? If the answer is yes, this fun, colorful, and interactive journal is for you! With guidance from Raina, brainstorm ideas and use your imagination to create your own stories.Includes bonus and behind-the-scenes material from Raina and her own comics-making adventures!
author: Raina Telgemeier
